channel.title: Draynor
channel.description:
Surprised this wasn't made yet. :|
Anyway, I'm sure you've all seen the Draynor graphical update, what's your opinions on it? I don't think it looks half bad, I just don't like the blue fog around it. [IMG]http://services.jagex.com/m=news/img/screenshots/area/2011/draynor_update_thumb.jpg[/img]
Also, there was a bunch of new hats added depending how many kills you have in the wilderness/dueling arena, etc. The more kills you get, the 'cooler' hat you get. I honestly don't care for the hat update, but I guess it's kind of cool.
[IMG]http://services.jagex.com/m=news/img/screenshots/misc/2011/dhats_wildstalker_thumb.gif[/img] http://services.runescape.com/m=news/death-hats-draynor-and-upgrades

item.title: Draynor
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:14, topic:396405”]I really like it, I was kinda hoping for dynamic day/night to be added into the game when I first saw the teasers a few days ago, but oh well.

re: trees, I’m sure they’re waiting to update all the trees in the game at once rather than in batches.[/quote]
if they do that, and it shouldn’t be that hard, it would be very awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: Draynor
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“gnomez, post:20, topic:396405”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=493574.msg3608786#msg3608786 date=1306362678]
It ain’t good compared to the drawn one… I guess they tryed to make it look spooky but completely failed.
[/quote]
i think that has to do with your graphics settings
Edit:
put all your settings on high and set it to direct x it looks really good

It looks like Darkshire.

yeah jagex is stealing alot of stuff from wow lately[/quote]

Retard? I always have settings high yet it still looks shit, how can you say it looks good?

25irdoy.jpg761×537

item.title: Draynor
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:26, topic:396405”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=493574.msg3609207#msg3609207 date=1306391581]

It looks pretty good on high detail actually, and they updated the market to look better

Ehh still though, I don’t know what jagex is doing trying to do graphical updates. They will always be behind in those.
[/quote]They can only do so much in a browser game though :/[/quote]
well i guess they arent trying so hard anymore with them working on stellardawn and the new area for rs but they can do alot more then they currently have

Read full topic
